remMethod.val: un(不) + desirable(合意的) → 不合意的 → 令人不悦的

words.tran: 令人不快地；不受欢迎地
不合需要；不受欢迎；不良；不愉快

trans.tranOther: something or someone that is undesirable is not welcome or wanted because they may affect a situation or person in a bad way

trans.tranOther: someone who is considered to be immoral, criminal, or socially unacceptable
